name: WILLIAMS & JENSEN, PLLC (ON BEHALF OF CALPERS)
description: Law firm that provides federal legislative representation.
sampleDescriptions: Opposition to provision of HR 1, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, that would expand the application of the Unrelated Business Income Tax (UBIT) to public employee retirement systems.
